title: [Large-scale] Practical Course on Iterative Learning Control (ILC) for Tracking Control of Linear Time-Varying Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control theory and linear systems comprehension
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training for robotics control and industrial control system managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of Iterative Learning Control (ILC) and apply them to system tracking problems.
Learners can implement the design process of DÎ±-type ILC, including initial state learning techniques, through hands-on practice.
Learners can theoretically analyze the convergence conditions of linear time-varying systems and verify them via simulation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
